name: Monster Rescue
description:
This is a short platforming game.

Controls:

A and D to move. Space to jump.

Idea of the game:

Evil princess have jailed your monster friend. She is unhappy and don't like to see happy people in her domain.

Your mission is to reach her castle and find your friend and free him avoiding evil creatures.

Good luck!

This game was made during "Pelinteon perusteet" (basics of making games) course and is my first game.
